---
title: "config.yml"
---

## High-level description
The target file is a configuration file for GitHub issue templates. It enables the creation of blank issues and provides contact links for users to engage in discussions or ask questions through Discord or GitHub Discussions.

## Code Structure
The file is structured in YAML format, which is commonly used for configuration files. It contains two main sections: `blank_issues_enabled` and `contact_links`. The `contact_links` section is a list of dictionaries, each containing a `name`, `url`, and `about` field.

## Symbols

### `blank_issues_enabled`
#### Description
This setting determines whether users can open blank issues in the GitHub repository.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| blank_issues_enabled | boolean | Indicates if blank issues are allowed. |

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| N/A | N/A | N/A |

### `contact_links`
#### Description
This section provides links for users to contact the project team or community for discussions and questions.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| contact_links | list | A list of contact options with details. |

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| N/A | N/A | N/A |

#### Internal Logic
Each entry in the `contact_links` list is a dictionary with the following fields:
- `name`: The display name of the contact option.
- `url`: The URL where users can reach the contact option.
- `about`: A brief description of the purpose of the contact option.

## Dependencies
No external libraries or modules are used in this configuration file.

## Configuration
| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| blank_issues_enabled | boolean | true | Allows users to create blank issues. |
| contact_links | list | N/A | Provides contact options for users. |

## Error Handling
There is no error handling in this configuration file as it is a static YAML file meant for configuration purposes.

## Logging
There is no logging implemented in this configuration file.

## API/Interface Reference
This file does not define an API or public interface. It is used internally by GitHub to configure issue templates and contact links.

## TODOs
There are no TODOs or notes left in the code.
